body_html:
I ran the mnist example script on a machine with 2 K80 gpus on pytorch master (with cuda 8, python 3.5, gcc 5.4 on Ubuntu 16.04) and it did not hang. I'll try installing cuda 9 and seeing if that changes anything

Update: tried cuda 9, python 3.5, gcc 5.4 on Ubuntu 16.04 and could not replicate.
